value.title: Hill ID
value.comment: Matches the hill with coins (and possibly other sprites)

list.title: Style / Size
list.comment: If set to 0, the size can be increased with nybbles 9 and 10.

value.title: Z-Order
value.comment: If you have multiple hills overlapping each other, you can use this value to stop graphics glitches from occurring. Hills with a higher Z-Order number will show behind hills with a lower number.

value.title: Size increase
value.comment: Only works when the style is set to 0.

list.title: Shell Base
list.comment: This Turtle Shell Cave is a Layer 0 (Foreground) sprite. To recreate its original function, use invisible blocks, and reference NewerSMBW Holiday Special 1-3
